name: docker-python-app
description: Flask Docker application with npm scripts for development

scripts.install-requirements: docker-compose run --rm dev pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.help: echo '\nAvailable commands:' && echo '  npm run build                    - Build Docker image' && echo '  npm start                        - Run the application' && echo '  npm run dev                      - Run in development mode' && echo '  npm run shell                    - Interactive container shell' && echo '  npm run logs                     - View application logs' && echo '  npm run clean                    - Clean up containers and images' && echo '  npm run list-packages            - Show installed packages' && echo '  npm run install-requirements     - Install all requirements' && echo '  npm run install-package <pkg>    - Install a package' && echo '  npm run remove-package <pkg>     - Remove a package' && echo ''
